meanings.definition: A narrative or account of events.
meanings.sent1: The recits of the old man's adventures were captivating.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading the recits of historical battles.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they listened to the recits of the talking animals.
meanings.sent4: Her recits of the family reunion painted a vivid picture in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The recits of the explorer's journey made us feel like we were right there with him.

meanings.definition: To tell or narrate a story.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa loves to recits tales of his youth.
meanings.sent2: She recits the legend of the brave knight to the children every night.
meanings.sent3: The comedian recits jokes that always make the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: He recits his dreams as if they were real-life adventures.
meanings.sent5: Reciting a story can transport you to a different world for a while.

meanings.definition: A short piece of music or literature.
meanings.sent1: The piano recits at the concert were beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a lovely recits for her school project.
meanings.sent3: The recits in the poetry book were full of emotion.
meanings.sent4: The recits of the composer were like a symphony in words.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the recits of the violin brought tears to her eyes.
